name: CyberPunk 20ZZ -html mobile (play off browser android & iphone)
name_original: CyberPunk 20ZZ -html mobile (play off browser android & iphone)
description:
USE CHROME OR SAFARI!!

3D web browser game framework that works on various browsers on Iphones and Android phones with no application install required - play right off your browser

- works best with Chrome, also can play off Safari. Other browsers might not work

- Cyberpunk adventure to collect orbs and enjoy a cyberpunk world. Goal was to create a game that can be played in browser off the phone. 

-- 6 scenes for now with varying level of detail

--- 4 levels urban cyberpunk

--- 1 level car racing on an urban cyber island

--- 1 level walking on an urban cyber island

-- use options to adjust graphics

-- file size: 67 mg

other games (including another html game) - ZOSUStudios - itch.io

- I am a solo indie game developer as a hobby and I wanted to make 3D areas that could be played on the phone without needing to install applications. 

****
